pinyin: gu4 ti3 re4 rong2 ji1 guang1 qi4

sentences.english: The experiment was carried out using a transversally excited flow CO2 laser.
sentences.chinese: 該實驗是用橫流電激勵CO2激光器進行的。

sentences.english: When the Q-Switch is off (closed), there is no power whatsoever being transmitted from the laser.
sentences.chinese: 當Q開關關斷時，激光器中就沒有功率傳輸。

sentences.english: A new design method to optimize a laser resonator is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種優化設計激光器諧振腔參數的新方法。

sentences.english: Each Lumen comes with a 250W sealed laser for power that is maintenance free.
sentences.chinese: 每個產品帶有一個250W密封激光器，無需維護。

sentences.english: This is a new method for quantitative studies in laser transverse mode.
sentences.chinese: 該方法是定量研究激光器橫模模式的新方法。

sentences.english: The miniature solid state green laser has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 研製成微型全固態綠激光器。

sentences.english: Thirdly the nanoporous random laser is brought forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了納米孔隙隨機激光器的設想。

sentences.english: Based on the Y-shaped cavity frequency splitting method, an orthogonal polarized He-Ne laser has been designed and implemented.
sentences.chinese: 研製了基於Y型腔結構的新型正交偏振氦氖激光器。

sentences.english: A method of making true color moving holograms with one-wavelength laser is proposed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用單色激光器製作真彩色動感全息圖的方法。

sentences.english: A new type nonplanar ring laser, which consists of only two spherical mirrors, was presented and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 對新型雙鏡非平面環行激光器進行了詳細的理論分析。

sentences.english: This laser design allows for broadband tuning.
sentences.chinese: 這種激光器允許激光的多頻率調諧。

sentences.english: The maladjustment of laser cavity and light beam quality .
sentences.chinese: 激光器腔的失調與光束質量。

sentences.english: and even use of a carbon dioxide laser to shrink the tonsils.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可以用二氧化碳激光器來收縮扁桃體。

sentences.english: A simplified theoretical model of double-cladding fiber laser is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了雙包層光纖激光器簡化的理論模型。

sentences.english: Optimization of P-doped cascaded Raman fiber lasers is discussed analytically.
sentences.chinese: 討論了二級級聯喇曼光纖激光器的解析解和優化設計。

sentences.english: These results are useful for design of such lasers.
sentences.chinese: 這對研製縱向塞曼穩頻激光器有指導意義。

definition: klystron (electronic tube used to produce high frequency radio waves)
